info.title: Offered Service Service
info.description:
Offered Services API to Singapur Project
 This microservice is in charge of setting and retrieving the different services that a professional has to offer. 
 URL Confluence: https://steps.everis.com/confluence/display/PROLEMER/Microservice+Offered+Services

get.summary: Retrieves all offered services, ordered by levels

200.description: The services are found and they are returned to the user following the level structure

get.summary: Retrieves visible content by offered service id and province id

200.description: The service is found and returned to the user

get.summary: Retrieves offered service with its id

200.description: The service is found and returned to the user

get.summary: Retrieves the children services of the given service

200.description: The children of the given service are returned
If the visible content exists then it's updated, if it doesn't, we add a new one

delete.summary: Delete Visible Content by offeredServiceId and provinceId

200.description: The services are found and they are returned to the user by zip code
The services details are found and they are returned to the user
The services are found and they are returned to the user following the level structure
The services are found and they are returned to the user by zip code

post.summary: Retrieves a professional's offered services by filters

200.description: The service is found and returned to the user

get.summary: Offered services actions with landong page in url

200.description: The service is found and returned to the user

get.summary: Offered services actions with landong page in url
Retrieves active and inactive offered service with its id

200.description: The service is found and returned to the user
